subtitle: many many many years ago long before I
ever created spirit science I was a
passionate animator and I loved telling
stories when I was 14 years old I
started a story that didn't have a name
I asked my friend one time what do you
think I should call this thing and he
said well exile's a cool word so why
don't you call it that and I said sure
cuz I didn't have any other better ideas
at the
time the story that I conceived of told
the tale of two kingdoms the tale of
friendship and betrayal of overcoming
the greatest of obstacles and of true
perfect love from the ages of 14 to 18 I
animated four episodes and then when I
turned 19 I had my Spiritual Awakening
everything in my life changed
dramatically and all of my focus shifted
to learning about the spiritual Sciences
of the world and sharing what I was
learning through spirit science the
Animated Series but Exile didn't die it
stayed deeply rooted in my heart and my
soul waiting for a time when I would
open it up once more over the last 5
years or so every once in a while this
story would emerge within me and was
transformed again and again it changed
to become a greater expression of itself
by implementing many of the things that
I was learning through my work with
spirit science the title of the story
was also reborn changing from exile into
Elixir today I want to share with you
these videos exactly as they were made
when I was a
teenager now you'll have to forgive my
14-year-old self he had absolutely no
training on script writing or character
development but I'm compelled to share
this with you today for a very
particular reason and it's a reason that
I can only explain once you've seen it
all however as you go through this you
might be confused at points or find
yourself wondering why am I watching
this and if so that's okay I encourage
you to have fun with this if you are
called make yourself comfortable get

Elixir it's called Elixir for two

central aspect of the story that
revolves around a particular
transcendental liquid much like an
elixir of life or a psychedelic
Brew but also on a more meta level it's
